00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Cost matrix functions for the constrained BTSP.
00003  *
00004  * Cost matrix transformation functions for the constrained bottleneck
00005  * traveling salesman problem (SBTSP).
00006  *
00007  * @author  John LaRusic
00008  * @ingroup lib
00009  ****************************************************************************/
00010 #include "common.h"
00011 #include "btsp.h"

00013 /****************************************************************************
00014  * Private data structures
00015  ****************************************************************************/
00016 /**
00017  *  @brief  Info for basic constrained cost matrix function.
00018  */
00019 typedef struct cbtsp_basic_data
00020 {
00021     int infinity;           /**< value to use for "infinity" */
00022     double feasible_length; /**< feasible length of a tour */
00023 } cbtsp_basic_data;
00024 
00025 /**
00026  *  @brief  Info for shake constrained cost matrix function.
00027  */
00028 typedef struct cbtsp_shake_data
00029 {
00030     int infinity;               /**< value to use for "infinity" */
00031     double feasible_length;     /**< feasible length of a tour */
00032     arrow_problem_info *info;   /**< problem info */
00033     int random_min;             /**< minimum random number generated */
00034     int random_max;             /**< maximum random number generated */
00035     int *random_list;           /**< random list of integers */
00036     int random_list_length;     /**< random list length */
00037 } cbtsp_shake_data;

00048  *  @param  i [in] id of start node

00050  *  @return cost between node i and node j
00051  */

00054                      int delta, int i, int j);

00074  *  @param  delta [in] delta parameter
00075  *  @param  tour_length [in] the length of the given tour
00076  *  @param  tour [in] the tour in node-node format
00077  *  @return ARROW_TRUE if the tour is feasible, ARROW_FALSE if not
00078  */

00081                      int delta, double tour_length, int *tour);

00124 /****************************************************************************
00125  * Public function implementations
00126  ****************************************************************************/
00127 int
00128 arrow_btsp_fun_cbtsp_basic(int shallow, double feasible_length, int infinity,
00129                            arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00130 {
00131     fun->data = NULL;
00132     if((fun->data = malloc(sizeof(cbtsp_basic_data))) == NULL)
00133     {
00134         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for cbtsp_basic_data");
00135         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00136     }
00137     
00138     cbtsp_basic_data *cbtsp_data = (cbtsp_basic_data *)fun->data;
00139     cbtsp_data->infinity = infinity;
00140     cbtsp_data->feasible_length = feasible_length;
00141     
00142     fun->shallow = shallow;
00143     fun->get_cost = basic_cbtsp_get_cost;
00144     fun->initialize = basic_cbtsp_initialize;
00145     fun->destruct = basic_cbtsp_destruct;
00146     fun->feasible = basic_cbtsp_feasible;
00147     
00148     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00149 }
00150 
00151 int
00152 arrow_btsp_fun_cbtsp_shake(int shallow, double feasible_length, int infinity,
00153                            int random_min, int random_max, 
00154                            arrow_problem_info *info, arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00155 {
00156     fun->data = NULL;
00157     if((fun->data = malloc(sizeof(cbtsp_shake_data))) == NULL)
00158     {
00159         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for cbtsp_shake_data");
00160         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00161     }
00162     
00163     cbtsp_shake_data *cbtsp_data = (cbtsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00164     cbtsp_data->infinity = infinity;
00165     cbtsp_data->feasible_length = feasible_length;
00166     cbtsp_data->info = info;
00167     
00168     cbtsp_data->random_min = random_min;
00169     cbtsp_data->random_max = random_max;
00170     cbtsp_data->random_list_length = info->cost_list_length;
00171     
00172     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(cbtsp_data->random_list_length,
00173                                     &(cbtsp_data->random_list)))
00174     {
00175         arrow_print_error("Could not allocate memory for random list");
00176         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00177     }
00178     
00179     fun->shallow = shallow;
00180     fun->get_cost = cbtsp_shake_get_cost;
00181     fun->initialize = cbtsp_shake_initialize;
00182     fun->destruct = cbtsp_shake_destruct;
00183     fun->feasible = cbtsp_shake_feasible;
00184     
00185     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 /****************************************************************************
00190  * Private function implementations
00191  ****************************************************************************/
00192 int
00193 basic_cbtsp_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00194                      int delta, int i, int j)
00195 {
00196     cbtsp_basic_data *data = (cbtsp_basic_data *)fun->data;
00197     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00198     
00199     if(cost <= delta)
00200         return cost;
00201     else
00202         return data->infinity;
00203 }
00204 
00205 int
00206 basic_cbtsp_initialize(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00207 { 
00208     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00209 }
00210 
00211 void
00212 basic_cbtsp_destruct(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00213 {
00214     if(fun->data != NULL)
00215     {
00216         free(fun->data);
00217         fun->data = NULL;
00218     }
00219 }
00220 
00221 int
00222 basic_cbtsp_feasible(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, 
00223                     int delta, double tour_length, int *tour)
00224 {
00225     cbtsp_basic_data *data = (cbtsp_basic_data *)fun->data;
00226     return (tour_length <= data->feasible_length ? ARROW_TRUE : ARROW_FALSE);
00227 }
00228 
00229 int
00230 cbtsp_shake_get_cost(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem,
00231                      int delta, int i, int j)
00232 {
00233     cbtsp_shake_data *data = (cbtsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00234     int cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, i, j);
00235     
00236     int pos = -1;
00237     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(data->info, cost, &pos))
00238     {
00239         arrow_print_error("Could not find cost in ordered cost list!");
00240         return data->infinity;
00241     }
00242     
00243     if(cost <= delta)
00244         return cost + data->random_list[pos];
00245     else
00246         return data->infinity;
00247 }
00248 
00249 int
00250 cbtsp_shake_initialize(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00251 { 
00252     int val;
00253     cbtsp_shake_data *data = (cbtsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00254     
00255     /* Need to generate a new list of random numbers */
00256     arrow_bintree tree;
00257     arrow_bintree_init(&tree);
00258     while(tree.size < data->random_list_length)
00259     {
00260         val = arrow_util_random_between(data->random_min, data->random_max);
00261         arrow_bintree_insert(&tree, val);
00262     }
00263     arrow_bintree_to_array(&tree, data->random_list);
00264     
00265     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00266 }
00267 
00268 void
00269 cbtsp_shake_destruct(arrow_btsp_fun *fun)
00270 {
00271     if(fun->data != NULL)
00272     {
00273         cbtsp_shake_data *data = (cbtsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00274         free(data->random_list);
00275         
00276         free(fun->data);
00277         fun->data = NULL;
00278     }
00279 }
00280 
00281 int
00282 cbtsp_shake_feasible(arrow_btsp_fun *fun, arrow_problem *base_problem, 
00283                     int delta, double tour_length, int *tour)
00284 {
00285     int i, u, v, cost;
00286     int n = base_problem->size;
00287     double actual_length = 0.0;
00288     
00289     cbtsp_shake_data *data = (cbtsp_shake_data *)fun->data;
00290     
00291     for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
00292     {
00293         u = tour[i];
00294         v = tour[(i + 1) % n];
00295         cost = base_problem->get_cost(base_problem, u, v);
00296         
00297         if(cost > delta)
00298             return ARROW_FALSE;
00299         
00300         actual_length += cost;
00301         if(actual_length > data->feasible_length)
00302             return ARROW_FALSE;
00303     }
00304     
00305     return ARROW_TRUE;
00306 }
